named-query.name: Commit.findLastForEachDay
named-query.query: select c from Commit c where c.sequenceNumber in ( select MAX(c2.sequenceNumber) from Commit c2 where c2.project.id = :projectId and c2.timestamp between :startDate and :endDate group by c2.dateCoordinates.year, c2.dateCoordinates.month, c2.dateCoordinates.dayOfMonth )
